p: Viral culture was performed using chick embryo, the avian cell line DF-1, and five other cell lines (HEp-2, Vero E6, human embryonic lung fibroblast, Caco-2 and BSC-1) as previously reported [29], [30]. All infected cell lines were incubated at 37Â°C for seven days, passaged once and then incubated for another seven days. The cell lines were examined for cytopathic effect using inverted light microscopy on days 1, 3, 5, and 7 of incubation.
